overview.description: The JCL IBM job 'OPENFIL' executes the 'SDSF' program to open various CICS files using specific commands.

dd_statement.logic:
/F CICSA,'CEMT SET FIL(TRANSACT ) OPE'
 /F CICSA,'CEMT SET FIL(CCXREF ) OPE'
 /F CICSA,'CEMT SET FIL(ACCTDAT ) OPE'
 /F CICSA,'CEMT SET FIL(CXACAIX ) OPE'
 /F CICSA,'CEMT SET FIL(USRSEC ) OPE'
